org.hps.util

Class GenerateSingleParticles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.util.GenerateSingleParticles

  • public class GenerateSingleParticles
extends Object
    Simple java program to generate single particles of fixed momentum uniformly distributed in pseudorapidity.
